name: Communing
Text: 'If your starting location has exactly 2 [Light Side Force], play instead of a starting interrupt. deploy from Reserve Deck two always [Immune to Alter] Effects; reshuffle. Deploy on table; take into hand and stack a Jedi here from Reserve Deck (that Jedi is ''communing''); reshuffle. Luminous Beings: Whenever a Jedi is lost (or placed out of play) from table, may stack it here. Jedi stacked here are considered out of play. You generate +1 Force for each card stacked here. I Can''t Believe He''s Gone Is canceled. Once per turn, if two cards here, may use 1 Force to look at top card of Reserve Deck, Force Pile, and/or Used Pile; return one card to each deck or pile.',
